subject: [Radiance-general] Git for Windows and starting tutorials
body:
The best basic Radiance tutorial (not using any of the modern
techniques) is still the one in *Rendering with Radiance* which, um, I
sell.

Drop me a note if you're looking for a copy.


--
Randolph M. Fritz, Lighting Design and Simulation
